title: lol client version 6.1.16_01_20_13_46 rejected by server
body:
Having this issue, any way to fix it that doesn't involve using up my mobile data on another 1 gig download? I've already had to do the delete Air client fix twice this month :/

I would be very grateful for any help

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

The only way to fix this issue is to [force a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5).
